headline: Northern Trust (NasdaqGS:NTRS) Partners With ECO For Digital Carbon Credit Services
summary: Northern Trust (NasdaqGS:NTRS) recently secured a service agreement with the UK's Ecosystem Certification Organisation, aiming to enhance transparency in the digital carbon credit market. Concurrently, the company posted solid quarterly earnings, with net income nearly doubling year-over-year and declared robust dividends. These developments coincide with favorable market trends, as stocks, including Northern Trust, rose on positive earnings and hopes for eased tariffs. The company's share...

headline: 3 Reliable Dividend Stocks Offering Up To 3.6% Yield
summary: As the U.S. stock market experiences a rise with investors digesting earnings reports and anticipating tariff news, both the Dow Jones and S&P 500 are on track to extend their winning streaks. In this environment of cautious optimism, dividend stocks can offer a reliable income stream, providing stability amid market fluctuations.

headline: NFS ECO Appoints Northern Trust to Administer Natural Capital Credits
summary: CHICAGO & LONDON, April 29, 2025--The Northern Trust Carbon Ecosystem will record the ‘Natural Capital Credits’ generated by NFS-certified projects and perform custodial services.
